title: MoreCharcoal
author: tinyplayerss
description: Gain more Charcoal from Burning Any Fuel Source!
longDescription:
Smelt any fuel source in the Campfire Bench and produce more charcoal than usual.

This mod is still in early development, so be aware that using certain fuel sources may behave differently than expected. For example:
- Sticks.
- Any wood log.
- Etc.

As a note: I had friends test this mod and it works. Since I do not own the Standard Edition of Hytale, I’m unable to live-code the mod in-game, so I used online resources during development. My goal is to eventually develop more mods directly from the game rather than relying on external tools.

Installation Guide:

1. Download the mod using the 'Download File' button provided on this page.

2. Locate your Hytale installation directory.

3. Open the UserData folder inside the Hytale directory. You should see a 'Mods' folder.

4. Drag and drop the extracted mod into the 'Mods' folder, then launch the game using the Hytale Launcher.

5. To enable the mod, go to your Worlds menu, right-click a world to edit it, and find the mod list under the world thumbnail. Check the box to enable the mod and save your changes.

6. Join the world where the mod is enabled, use your default Campfire, burn any fuel source, and you’ll see that using 2 fuel items produces 5 charcoal.

title: Kweebec Merchant Plus
author: tinyplayerss
description: Look at the Trade selections! and Trade when You find Kweebec Merchant
longDescription:
Enhance your journey with a specialized Kweebec Trading system! This mod overhauls the default Kweebec Merchant to act as a vital source for Life Essence and essential survival gear.

WORK IN PROGRESS (WIP): This mod is in active development. I will be adding more botanical trades and refining the balance over time!

Featured Reward:
- The Big Backpack: A powerful early-to-mid game upgrade! This high-value item is now available through the merchant to help you carry more resources on your adventures.

Current Trade Selections:
- Fixed Trades: Exchange Tree Sap (20), Fiber (5), and Bamboo (25) for Life Essence.
- Specialty Items: Trade rare Poison Fruit for 75 Life Essence or a Crude Bed for Concentrated Life Essence.
- Rotating Pool: A dynamic slot that refreshes every 3 days with bulk Mushroom Flatcaps, Mushroom Salads, or a rare high-tier trade for 100 Boom Powder.

Have a Suggestion? I want to hear from you! If there are specific plant-based items or resources you think should be tradable for Life Essence, please leave a comment. Your suggestions could be included in the next update!

As a note: I had friends test this mod and it works. Since I do not own the Standard Edition of Hytale, I’m unable to live-code the mod in-game, so I used online resources during development. My goal is to eventually develop more mods directly from the game rather than relying on external tools.

Installation Guide:

1. Download the mod using the 'Download File' button.
2. Locate your Hytale installation directory.
3. Open the UserData/Mods folder.
4. Drag and drop the extracted mod folder into 'Mods'.
5. In the Hytale World menu, edit your world and enable the mod in the list.
6. Join your world and find a Kweebec Merchant to start trading! Note: If you update the mod, you must rejoin your world to see the new trade selections.
